deck.name: Synthetic Research
deck.text: Move the top 2 cards of your deck under your Field card face up, and if you do, draw 2 cards. If your Field area is empty, draw 2 cards instead.
deck.metadata: Some pirates can't imagine being in the Cayne Pirates because most of the crew members are evil girls. They say that the female pirates are succubi that suck out the blood from all the male crew members. They think "How can anything get done in that ship!"

deck.name: Big Red Button
deck.text:
Target: 1 Character card with {Robot} in your DP
If your Field card has a FIRE Symbol, select Character cards with <MECHA> in your DP whose combined Turn Costs equal the target's Turn Cost times 2, and if you do, shuffle the selected cards into your deck and put the target in play.
